name: CRED's Synth Design System
description:
About

Synth is a Design system developed by CRED which uses Neumorphism beautifully. I really liked it and decided to build it for the Figma community so everyone can learn and use it.

To build this system, I took references from Synth code which is open source and available on GitHub.


Version History

  • Component: Credit-card bill pay
  • Component: Bank logo with shadow
  • Component: Circular checkbox
  • Component: Bill payment bottom sheet
  • Component: Bank transaction info
  • Component: 24 option component (variants)
  • Component: 9 Extra options (variants)
  • Added uncategorized section for uncategorized components

  • Added four offer cards


Style guide

  • 20px semibold added
  • 20px semibold cap added


Icons & logos

Improvements and fixes

  • added tags to some components for better & faster search
  • segregated more components to atoms and molecule
